afzkl.development.colorpickerview.drawable

Class AlphaPatternDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • afzkl.development.colorpickerview.drawable.AlphaPatternDrawable

  • public class AlphaPatternDrawable
extends Drawable
    This drawable will draw a simple white and gray chessboard pattern. It's pattern you will often see as a background behind a partly transparent image in many applications.
    Author:
    Daniel Nilsson

      • mBitmap

        private Bitmap mBitmap
        Bitmap in which the pattern will be cached. This is so the pattern will not have to be recreated each time draw() gets called. Because recreating the pattern i rather expensive. I will only be recreated if the size changes.

      • generatePatternBitmap

        private void generatePatternBitmap()
        This will generate a bitmap with the pattern as big as the rectangle we were allow to draw on. We do this to chache the bitmap so we don't need to recreate it each time draw() is called since it takes a few milliseconds.
